price: 26. (Na yango), elobamaki naye: Kota na lola. Alobi: Soki bato na ngai bayebaka.
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
